sushi_dynamics

sushi_dynamics.modal_test

calc_mac(v1, v2)

Calculates the MAC matrix given two matrices.

Parameters
v1ndarray

First matrix.

v2ndarray

Second matrix.

Returns
macndarray

Notes

The matrices must be the same sizes.

calc_xo(v1, v2, maa)

Calculates the cross ortho matrix.

Parameters
v1ndarray

Left vector.

v2ndarray

Right Vector

maandarray

Mass matrix.

Returns
xoxo matrix.

Notes

Phi and Maa must have same DoF.

mass_norm(phi, maa, check=False)

This function normalizes the phi w.r.t to the mass matrix. Phi is normalized such that \(\phi^T.M_{aa}.\phi = I\)

Parameters
phindarray

Phi vector.

maandarray

Mass matrix.

checkbool, optional

If True, returns the resulting \(\phi^T.M_{aa}.\phi\) matrix. The diagonals must be 1.

Returns
phindarray

mass normalized phi matrix.

i_check: ndarray

\(\phi^T.M_{aa}.\phi\) matrix.

Notes

Phi and Maa must have same DoF. Maa must be a square matrix.

Examples

>>> phi_norm = mass_norm(phi, maa)
>>> # Passing check returns extra matrix, so must create another variable to unpack properly.  
>>> phi_norm, product = mass_norm(phi,maa, check = True)
